inn1.comm: what a start! Zaheer lands it on a good length bang on middle stump, gets the ball to drift in to the right-hander before pitching. Clarke gets a half stride forward and the ball strikes him right in front. The umpire had no hesitation in raising his finger as Zaheer went up in appeal
oh well after  the euphoria of the wicket, Zaheer slips that one way down leg side, Dhoni has to fling himself to his left to take that
good length, pitches on middle again and straightens, Ponting gets right behind the ball and defends
this time Zaheer gets it to slant across the batsman. Plenty of away movement in that one and Ponting lets it go
that was sloppy stuff. Zaheer sprays that wide outside the off stump and the movement takes it further away
beaten! the line is closer to the off stump this time. Ponting was drawn forward
fullish delivery again outside off, Ponting chooses to let it go
back of a length on middle and leg, cuts in a little and Ponting glances it off his hips to fine leg
loosener from RP Singh on middle and leg, Ponting shuffles a little across his stumps and glances it square. square leg runs across and cuts it off
fuller in length though wide down the leg side. RP tries to work up some swing
appeal! full delivery outside the off stump, the ball goes through with the line and hits Ponting on the front pad. He got a good stride forward and replays showed that he was struck outside the line
full and in the slot to drive, pushed back to RP
good length outside the off stump, bit of away movement for RP and Ponting lets it go
plenty of inswing there and the ball slides down the leg side. Ponting goes for the fine-leg glance but doesnt connect
and this goes the other way! RP struggles with his radar as the ball goes way outside the off stump. Lots of work for the umpires already
drifts towards the pads and worked across the line with the wrists to square leg
down the leg side, plenty of inswing again which RP fails to control
drifts on the pads again. Too full and Ponting obliges by working it with his wrists down to the square leg boundary
overpitched just outside the off stump, Gilchrist leans forward for the drive and the ball meets the toe edge of the bat and races to third man
beaten! Zaheer finds the right line and length outside the off stump. The ball climbs on ponting a little as he sticks his bat out
full and just a little too wide, Ponting opens the face and plays it down to third man
good length around the off stump, comes in after pitching. Gilchrist gets behind the line and defends
beaten! pitches just outside the off stump and goes away with the angle. Gilchrist fishes outside the off stump
good length on middle, gets the ball to cut in, worked to the on side
good length on leg and middle, swings into the right hander and drifts close to the pads. Glanced to fine leg
good line and length on the corridor outside off, Gilchrist watches the away movement and lets it go
beaten! bang on target outside the off stump, Gilchrist gets a half stride forward, pokes at it and the late away movement saves him
RP Singh strays just a little too wide outside off, the away movement doesnt help his cause though
pitches on middle and leg and moves away from the left hander, glanced to fine leg
good length on middle stump, Gilchrist gets forward and shapes to drive on the on side. Turns into a defensive push to midwicket
and another wide, pitches on leg and continues with the angle down the leg side
Zaheer compensates by landing it outside the off stump, Ponting shoulders arms. That was close to being a wide
half volley on middle and leg, Ponting gets his bat down on it quickly and tries to drive past the bowler. Zaheer is alert enough to bend down and get his left hand to it. Good stop
good length around the off stump, pushed towards the covers
lands it on a length outside off at a lively pace. Ponting is careful with his off stump and again chooses to leave it

short of a length on leg stump. Ponting goes on the backfoot and tries to defend but is caught unaware by the inward movement and is caught high on the pad. Zaheer appeals confidently but it was striking him too high
pushed to the off side
Ponting shapes to play that on the on side but plays with an angled bat. the ball rolls to the off side instead
fullish in length and movement away from the right hander. Ponting goes for the drive and misses
half volley outside off and a forward defensive push sends the ball sprinting past the right of mid-off
holds the length back a little. Ponting stays on the front foot and drives towards point
just a tough too full outside the off stump. Ponting goes forward a little and plays a square drive past point and cover. That was all timing
beaten! in the corridor outside off, draws Ponting forward for the drive. Ponting doesnt quite meet the pitch of the ball and is sliced in half
RP struggles for consistency as he sends that wide outside off
RP errs in length again. pitches on a fullish length on middle and leg and drifts towards the pads. Ponting gets across and works that with ease past square leg
good length outside off, left alone

short of a length outside off, Gilchrist didnt expect that to swing so much away from him as the ball beat the bat. The carry wasnt there for Dhoni who had to dive low to his left. The ball deflects from his glove and races past the slips
pushed to the off side
played back to the bowler

edged and dropped! fullish delivery outsuide off, Gilchrist goes for the drive on the off side and gets a thick inside edge to Uthappa at second slip. Uthappa leaps to take it above his head but the ball deflects off his fingers to the boundary. That was a chance
strikes him high on the pad and zaheer appeals! that was going above the stumps surely
short of a good length on leg stump, glanced off the hips to the on side
good line and length on off and middle, defended back to the bowler
low full toss. Gilchrist gets a half stride forward and meets the ball off the full face and places that in the gap between point and cover
pushed firmly to Murali Kartik at mid-on who does well to slide across to his right and cut it off.
short and wide outside off, Gilchrist slashes that one over point and cover and the ball sails to the boundary off the second bounce
...and Gilchrist glides that one down to Uthappa at deep point for a single
pushed down to the on side
just short of a length on off, Gilchrist reads the length early and swivels. he pulls and places the ball wide of square leg
good length outside off, comes into the left-hander, Gilchrist gets across and works the ball to midwicket

beaten! teasing line outside off, draws the batsman forward with the drive. Gilchrist tries to drive straight but is beaten and on the follow through releases one hand off the handle. That showed he was in no control of the stroke
tucked towards midwicket
good length on leg stump, comes in. Ponting goes across and glances to fine leg

Gilchrist goes for the wild slash and pays the price! that was full and swinging away from the left hander outside off. Gilchrist goes for the expansive slash over point and gets a thick top edge which flies to Harbhajan running to his right from third man
and a four to ease the pressure! Pathan errs by sliding on Hodge's pads. Hodge shuffles a little and glances it down to fine leg
that was an assured leave outside off stump
drifts a little on the pads and Hodge shuffles and works it past square leg for a couple
brings the line outside off, Hodge watches it carefully and leaves it

funny looking stroke from Ponting there! that was just a little wide outside off and Ponting, who should've played that on the front foot went on the backfoot instead and tried to cut it square of the wicket. Beaten in the end
full in length, pushed to the off side
short of a length in line with the stumps, Ponting goes forward and the ball strikes him high on the top-fglap of the front pad. RP appeals confidently but the ball struck Ponting too high
width offered outside off and Ponting stretches his bat at it and plays a controlled slash past the slips. The ball just beats third man
that was so wide outside off that Steve Harmison would've been proud of that!
RP struggles ith his radar again and gives Ponting too much width outside off. Ponting moves across his stumps and cuts fiercely past cover and point
full, on the pads, Hodge flicks and the ball is airborne. the ball just falls short of Murali Kartik at fine leg
driven on the up towards point and again the ball just falls short of the fielder - Yuvraj this time. At least he saved a couple of runs
pushed to mid-on and Ponting scampers back to the other end and beats Zaheer's throw
defended neatly on the front foot
appeal! Hodge gets a half stride forward to meet the ball outside off. The ball jags back in but strikes him outside the line
that was a more assured defensive push to mid-off
fullish in length outside off, Hodge opts to play safe and just pushes that one to point
starts off with a big inswinger close to a yorker length. Ponting watches it carefully and digs it out to midwicket
bit of swing again but Ganguly drifts down leg. Beats Dhoni
cramps Ponting for room outside off. Ponting shapes to cut but gets a big inside edge onto his pads
defensive push, beats Ganguly and goes to mid-on. Ponting sets off and makes his ground just in time after the stumps are dislodged at the non-striker's end
overpitched outside off and in the slot to drive. Hodge gets a good stride forward, meets the ball off the full face of the bat and beats cover
sliding down leg, Dhoni collects it this time
better line and length, closer to the batsman outside off, pushed to the off side
good length on off stump, Hodge stays on the front foot and defends
good length just outside off, goes back and pushes to point
sloer ball and a touch too full, leans forward and pushes to cover
quicker delivery, 136 lph, fired in on middle stump, Ponting is quick to the task and defends back to Pathan
good length on off stump, pushed to point
cuts down on the pace, 117 kph, Ponting gets forward and pushes the ball back to Pathan
good running! full and Ponting leans forward in advance for the defensive push. He sets off in a flash after the ball beats Pathan and completes the run
on the pads and worked to the on side
Ganguly sprays the ball down the leg side and there's little Dhoni can do to get a hand to it, let alone collect cleanly
better line and length, outside the off stump, glided down to gully
sprays down the leg side and Ponting - on leg glance - just gets a feather touch to it. No fielder in sight to save the boundary down fine leg
holds the length back, still strays on the leg and middle though. pushed to mid-on
off cutter, pitches just outside the off stump, Hodge shuffles a little and works it to the on side for a single
pushed to mid-on
fullish length, Hodge comes forward and on-drives to Zaheer at mid-on
back of a length outside leg stump, easily tucked off the hips and through the vacant gap at square leg out to Ganguly in the deep

good delivery, picthing on a short length, jagging in with extra bounce and cutting Ponting in half, there's noise as the ball zips in and Dhoni collects it after it deviates sharply but umpire Sahiba doesnt react to the extended appeal
standing well outside his crease, Ponting gets on top of a short delivery and square-drives well behind point for four
good length delivery, he comes forward but cant beat the fielders on the off
back of a length outside off stump this time, he shuffles in his crease but cant beat backward point
good delivery, pitching on a teasing length, off stumpish, and bouncing as Hodge gets forward and defends uneasily
quicker delivery goes down leg stump for a wide
tossed up on middle and off and getting it to turn in, Hodge taps it to leg
quicker through the air and Hodge initially comes forward but then waits on it as the ball spins  in from middle stump
this one drifts too much down leg stump and Hodge works it to short fine leg
almost! Harbhajan tosses it up on off stump and a nervouse Hodge drives it back to him but it doesnt carry as the bowler moves to his left
quicker one on middle and leg, tucked towards square leg
tossed up from around the stumps, between the umpire and stumps, on a length and Ponting lunges forward to defend
a touch shorter, allowing Ponting time to get back and drive to cover
sharp bounce this time, and a hint  of turn as Ponting gets back and is squared up, the ball spinning past his bat
tossed up nicely, he gets well forward and pushes to cover
back of a length now, and Ponting gets back to drive but cant beat cover again
tossed up teasingly, Ponting gets forward and defends to complete a very good over
quick delivery,  the topspinner, bounces outside off stump and Hodge runs it past slip
tossed up outside off, Hodge gets a good stride in and tries to smother the spin, but the ball clips his pad and rolls fine
straighter delivery on middle and off, Hodge comes forward and taps it to midwicket and sprints down to the other end
lands on middle and leg and spins down, Ponting nudges it fine to get to 49
short and flat, pitches outside leg and spins sharply further, Hodge tries to pull and Dhoni misses out
tossed up on middle and leg and Ponting deftly sweeps it away for four, raising his 50
tossed up on middle and leg, Hodge comes forward and defends
flatter delivery, middle stump and spinning away, Hodge defends to cover
again Kartik gets it to turn from middle stump and an uneasy Hodge defends
tight stuff this, pitching full and forcing Hodge to come forward and block .. he looks very uneasy against the spinners ...

and thats that, as Hodge, with limited footwork, pushes at a shorter and quicker delivery outside off stump and gives the wide slip catching practice, ending a scratchy innings in which he couldnt force it against the spinners

and the big man goes first ball! The ball's pretty ordinary, short and wide outside off stump and Kartik's extremely lucky to get Symonds, cutting at it and looking on as Tendulkar, in the covers, dives forward and takes a good catch!
back of a length, angled across Ponting, who defends to point going back
a touch fuller outside off and Ponting whips it straight to mid-on
sharp bouncer just outside leg stump, kicking off the surface and forcing Ponting to swivel out of harm's way
fuller in length this time, and a watchful Ponting gets forward and defends
another short delivery but ill-directed very wide of leg stump, Ponting tries to pull but cant get bat on it and Dhoni collects to his left
good length delivery outside off stump, Ponting gets forward and defends to cover

oh ho ho...how close was that? Pretty close, I'll tell you, as Ponting gets squared up by a short delivery going away from off stump and pushes it back in the air well wide of Zaheer, who tries in vain to get his left hand outstretched but just cant get there
tossed up teasingly on off stump but Ponting defends well, so no chance of that
quicker, shorter, flatter, Ponting makes room and cuts into the covers
tossed up, Haddin gets under it and gives it a big swing, the ball takes the toe end of the bat and balloons up safely over mid-off
tossed up on middle and leg, defended back to Kartik
flatter delivery on middle and off, he defends quickly, top bowling this as Haddin scampers one
teasing line, just a fraction short and Ponting gets behind it to defend
good bowling! Lands on a short length and slants across Haddin, rooted in his crease and pushing at it loosely outside off stump, beaten completely
back of a length delivery, pushed towards the fielders
fuller now, a touch slower, Haddin gets onto the front foot and drives back to Zaheer, who puts his left hand out and intercepts
back of a length, Haddin gets behind it and defends into the covers
quicker delivery, nipping off a short length and catching a hopping Haddin high on the knee roll but well outside the line of impact
top over from Zaheer, again keeping it tight just outside off stump and Haddin gets behind it to defend the last ball of a maiden over
touch too wide and Ponting drives through the covers for one out to sweeper
tossed up on a length, getting Haddin forward to defend watchfully
initially comes forward and Kartik alters the length and pace, bowling full and fast and Haddin defends
tossed up on off stump, Haddin drives uppishly but beats Kartik's dive and gets one to long-off
tossed up on leg stump, Ponting gets a huge stride in and defends, the ball clips the pad and Kartik appeals but the umpire's not convinced
good over comes to and as Kartik tosses it up on off and Ponting again defends
and its another bad ball, full and wide outside off for another wide
wide outside off again, Haddin reaches across and goes fishing and is beaten
back of a length outside off, stays low, Haddin drives to point off the back foot
slower one now, full and wide, Haddin gets down and drives loosely and is beaten
back of a length well outside off, Haddin judges it and shoulders arms
another slower ball from RP, full and looking for the yorker on off stump, its not perfected but still keeps Haddin quiet, pushing to cover
back of a length outside off stump, Haddin is content leaving it alone
tossed up on a length, off stumpish, and Ponting defends to the close-in man
drifts down leg stump, from middle and leg, Ponting sweeps to short fine leg
tossed up nicely on off stump, Haddin tentatively feels for it and pushes towards backward point
quicker delivery, not much turn, but Haddin is forced to get back and defend
there's a hint of turn, great delivery, pitching on a length and beating Haddin's poke at it as he's squared up
fuller and quicker, off stumpish again, Hadding on-drives but cant beat the fielders
edged and gone! Big wicket for RP, coming around the stumps again and bowling it a touch short, tempting Ponting to sway back and cut, but the result it a thick outside-edge which Dhoni snaps up
back of a length well outside off stump, asking the batsman to come after it but Hopes watchfully lets it through to Dhoni
still full, and a touch wider, and Hopes gives it a full-blooded drive but gets a thick outside-edge that screams away to third man for four
good length outside off stump again, this time Hopes leaves well enough alone
now thats a confident stroke! Hopes takes toll of the fuller length and drives excellently through the covers to pick up a much-better boundary early in his innings
short of a length well outside off stump, Hopes watches it go past safely
tossed up on middle and off, he comes forward and defends to silly point
fired in down leg stump, tucked off the pads towards square leg, its a leg-bye
tossed up on off stump, Hopes gets a good stride in and the ball clips him, rolling to leg safely off the inside-edge
slower ball, looped up nicely on middle and off, Haddin drives back to Kartik
tossed up again, he comes forward and drives down the ground, mid-off fields
tossed up a touch wider, allowing him room to drive through cover-point for one
good stuff, yorker in the blockhole and equally well dug out by Haddin
edged for four! RP bowls a slower ball, full and wide outside off stump, forcing Haddin to reach out and drive, and the thick edge flies over Tendulkar's fingers as he leaps up at wide slip
and then we have a confident shot like that! Haddin gets forward initially, likes the length, and slams it on the up over extra cover for a much more controlled four
short of a length well outside off now, and he leaves it be carefully
full and wide, Haddin flays the bat but cant get to it, thats a wide
good length outside off stump, Hadding gets over it and plays a good cover drive into the gap and picks up two, he looks good
back of a length outside off stump, Hadding gets up and shoulders arms
tossed up outside off, Hopes gets forward and a thickish edge takes the ball down to third man
that turned! kartik gets it to turn square from leg to off and squares up Hopes on the backfoot. Lucky not to edge that to the close in fielders
fullish outside off and Hopes dabs that away to third man. Controlled stroke in the end
defended back to the bowler
flighted on leg, catches Hopes with the turn again. He manages to defend to the on side
pushed in flat on off stump, defended back to Harbhajan

Dropped! Haddin takes a couple of paces forward and plays a slog sweep. The ball is airborne for a long time and Zaheer at deep square leg keeps his eyes on it but somehow lets it slip between his fingers. He may have been looking at the sun
pushed in flatter, swept square and RP Singh at the deep square leg boundary nearly over-runs the ball. Luckily he gets his right hand out on time and intercepts it

Kartik gets him with the arm ball! Haddin gets a half-stride forward to a delivery pitched on middle and straightening. The ball strikes him low on the front pad and that was an easy decision for Umpire Saheba
oh! tentative in defence there. nearly gets an inside edge onto the stumps
this time he chooses to leave it alone outside the off stump

bat-pad! flighted on off stump, Hogg gets a stride forward and appeared to get an inside edge onto the pads. Uthappa at forward short-leg takes the catch and the rest are certain they've got the wicket. Hogg looks rather unhappy with Saheba's decision though
Kartik takes five! flighted on off stump, draws Lee onto the forward drive and succeeds in getting an outside edge to RP Singh at gully. Kartik's on a hat-trick here...again!
Johnson blocks out the hat-trick ball with a forward defensive push. The ball just lands wide of silly point
tucked away to the on side for a single
tossed on middle and leg, strikes him on the pads outside the line. the ball rolls to the on side
flighted on off stump, defended to the covers
tucked to the on side for a couple
pushed in flatter and faster, Johnson plays really late and nearly chops the ball onto his stumps
flighted just outside off, Johnson plays with the turn and cuts past point
loose delivery outside off, Johnson rocks on the backfoot and cuts that firmly past point. Harbhajan dives in vain at the boundary edge
left alone safely outside off
defended back to kartik
flighted on middle and leg, pushed back to Kartik
flighted on middle and leg, pushed down to long-on
tossed up on middle and leg, Hopes gets down on his knee and sweeps
good length just outside off, Johnson goes back and gets an outside edge to third man
short of a length, climbs on Hopes around the off stump. he opens the face of the  bat and fends to point
Zaheer manages to get that extra bounce. That traps Hopes high on the pads as he tries to work it to the on side
fuller in length on off and middle, Hopes plays a confident forward defensive stroke
good length on middle, Hopes turns his wrists and works it to midwicket
full in length and on the pads, Hopes tries to work it to the on side and misses. Zaheer gets excited as the ball strikes the pads. That was goig down the leg side
flighted on off stump, pushed to midwicket
pushed in faster on middle and leg, Hopes plays with the line and pushes it wide of midwicket
Johnson gets on his knees and shapes to play the slog sweep. He only succeeds in hitting it along the ground to deep midwicket

Hopes misreads the turn! flighted around the middle stump. Hopes goes back and the ball spins from middle, goes through and clips the off stump. Big daylight between bat and pad on that one. That's six for Kartik... what a comeback!
Bracken gets a good stride forward and defends close to the pads. Dhoni gets excited as the ball clips the pads
flighted and full on middle, driven confidently back to Harbhajan
floated outside off, Johnson rocks back and cuts square
doosra. Bracken somehow manages to get his bat behind it and defend
flighted on off and middle, defended to the off side
another doosra. This lands just short of a good length and Bracken gets back and defends confidently
pitches on off and doesnt turn, Bracken defends off the full face of the bat
good length, fired in on off stump. Johnson shapes to cut and nearly chops the ball onto his stumps
fuller in length, Zaheer gets a good indrift and Johnson pushes it to mid-off
short of a length and Johnson swivels. He pulls and keeps the ball along the ground to deep square leg
tests Bracken with a lifter. Bracken takes the ball close to the arm guard and the ball rolls to the on side. They scamper through for a quick single
outside off and fended towards point for a single
fuller in length outside off, Bracken gets forward, opens the face of the bat, plays close to the pad and glides the ball down to third man
inside edge onto the pads and the ball rolls to silly point. Dhoni yells 'catch it'
nudged off the frontfoot wide of forward  short leg and Dhoni gets excited again
flighted outside off and left alone
Johnson aims for the slog sweep across the line, misses it completely
flighted outside, inviting another hoick down the on side, Johnson lets it go
attempts another heave and he misses again
big inswing into the righthander,a lmost lands on a yorker length. The ball clips Bracken's pads and rolls to the bowler. RP appeals
teasing line outside off, tempts Bracken to go for the slash past point and in the process, misses the ball
drifting on to the body this time, Bracken tries to tuck it away to the on side but wasnt in control of it
swinging in on off stump, confidently pushed towards mid-off
digs it in short outside off, Bracken goes for the pull but the bat nowhere near the ball
fuller in length outside off, left alone to the keeper
tossed up from around the stumps, Johnson thinks about playing but withdraws the bat as the ball spins past him
tossed up outside off, wider, he again leaves it alone
first six of the match! Johnson dances down, isnt to the pitch but carries through with his slog over the infield, the ball sails over long-offs head, just
tossed up again, quicker, he defends it back
flatter delivery, on a length, but Johnson dances down and heaves it over midwicket, hard and flat, for another crucial boundary
short and a touch wide, he gets back and mistimes his attempted cut to point
good length delivery on the stumps, Bracken plays it back confidently to RP
fuller delivery, angled in from outside off, he drives uneasily and gets an inside-edge onto the front leg, the ball rolls to point

and thats the end of that! Bracken gets a short-pitched delivery on the stumps, swivels into the pull, doesnt time it well at all and all Harbhajan has to do is jog in from fine leg and hold a simple catch.

inn2.comm: starts off with a waft outside the off stump, Ganguly tries to cut with the angle, rather tentatively
the 'wide bug' bites Lee now! way outside off and Ganguly opts not to chase that
drags the line closer to the off stump now, Ganguly gets his bat behind it and pushes to point
fired in at close to 150 kph, the ball rises on Ganguly and Gilchrist collects it near his face...raw pace folks
another unplayable lifter from Lee, he's firing them in and Ganguly couldnt do much with that
and he strays off line and sends this wide outside the offstump
beaten! fuller in length, on the corridor outside the off stump, Ganguly gets a tentative prod forward and the ball just beats the bat
good length on the stumps, this time Ganguly gets some wood on it and defends

well that was a nervy start for Sachin! Johnson pitches it short of a length and the ball jags back in, strikes high on the pad, misses the stumps through to the keeper. Gilchrist appeals, though half-heartedly
safely negotiated outside the off stump
tucked away with ease to midwicket with a turn of the wrists and Tendulkar's underway. The crowd roars

first blood to Johnson! teases Ganguly with a good length delivery pitching on off stump. The ball angles away from the left-hander after pitching and Ganguly is all at sea as he gets a thick outside edge through to Gilchrist
Karthik gets a wake-up call with a short delivery on leg stump, just misses the body as he takes evasive action
Johnson errs in line by sliding another one down the leg side
lands on a good length around off stump, karthik gets his bat down and defends off the full face of the bat
the 'wide bug' bites Johnson again. Slides down leg, Karthik shuffles to glance that down but the ball was too wide
full outside the off stump, Karthik stretches out to chase that and ends up hitting the ball off the bottom edge of the bat. The ball rolls behind the batsman
pacy delivery, 90.7 mph, pitches outside off and Tendulkar shoulders arms
time for another wide, down the leg side, Lee aims for that inswinger but mis-directs it
this time Lee chooses to shape the ball away from the right-hander, Tendulkar lets it go
Tendulkar shapes to cut square but Lee cramps him for room outside off. The ball rolls to the off side
fuller in length outside off, the ball doesnt move much as Tendulkar safely lets it go
full outside off and shaping away late. Tendulkar shapes to drive past ther covers but doesnt meet the ball off the meat of the bat. He ends up chopping the ball to the off side
beaten! pitched up outside off, tempting the cover drive again and Tendulkar nearly edges it through to Gilchrist
Johnson delivers that from slightly wide of the crease, gets the ball to angle away from Karthik. Left alone
good length outside off, Karthik gets nicely behind the line of the ball and punches it back towards Johnson
Johnson strives for that extra yard of pace but slides that so wide that first slip could have collected it on the full
better line, closer to the line of the stumps, Karthik goes back and defends

edged and gone! teasing length from Johnson - pitched up just outside the off stump. Karthik senses an opportunity to break the rut and get off the mark. he drives and the thinnest of edges goes through to Gilchrist

streaky but Yuvraj will take it! yorker length on off stump, Yuvraj tries to dig it out and gets a thick outside edge off the toe of the bat. The ball flies low towards gully and the fielder throws himself to his right. The ball beats him and races to third man
left alone to Gilchrist
lovely shot to ease the nerves! overpitched on the pads, Tendulkar shuffles and works it in the gap between mid-on and midwicket with a flick of the wrists
good comeback from Lee, beats him outside off as Tendulkar pokes at it
beats him again, and this time the away swing saves Tendulkar. That's the line to bowl
short of a length on middle, Tendulkar tucks it off his body to midwicket
digs it in short of a good length again and Tendulkar eases it back to the bowler
good length on line with middle stump, Tendulkar shapes to play across the line to the on side but adjusts his stroke. The ball rolls to mid-on
tests Yuvraj with a superb yorker on middle stump! Yuvraj just manages to dig it out the  ball races towards fine leg off the toe edge of the bat
holds the length back and Tendulkar defends
good length on middle and leg, timed beautifully but flicked straight to short midwicket
Johsnon errs with width outside off and Tendulkar square drives that superbly past point
width again and rightfully despatched! this was banged in short of a length and Tendulkar gets his bat down and punches the ball in the gap between cover and point
better line, doesnt give him much room, pushed to the off side
strays on the pads and Yuvraj plays a delectable flick down to fine leg. The tming in that should give him confidence
full in length just outside the off stump, hardly any away movement. Tendulkar gets his bat down and defends
on the pads and Tendulkar times that sweetly as he flicks down to fine leg. The ball appeared like it was going to race away to the boundary. The placement wasn;t quite as perfect
left alone outside the off stump
outside the off stump again and Yuvraj isn't interested
full in length outside off, Yuvraj gets a good stride forward and pushes it towards cover
oh! how did that miss? lands on a good length just outside off, cuts in sharply, Tendulkar gets forward to defend and the ball gets a thin inside edge, beats the stumps and a diving Gilchrist
left alone but streaky! I tell you that ball was barely a few inches from the off stump
this time Tendulkar gets some wood and pushes to the off side
inswing into the right hander, Tendulkar shuffles a little, plays across the line and finds the gap between midwicket and square leg
good length on off stump, Yuvraj defends on the frontfoot
beaten! in the corridor outside the off stump, Yuvraj just had to poke at it and Bracken wonders how on earth he didn't get bat on that
this ball is upto some tricks here! first it moves away before pitching, Tendulkar shapes to cut and suddenly moves in after pitching. Poor Gilchrist has no time to adjust as he dives in vain to left
dug in short and that sails over Tendulkar's head
good length on off stump, played to the off side
good length on the stumps, Tendulkar pushes it to mid-on
full and quick outside the off stump, Tendulkar shapes to drive on the on side but plays an inside out stroke as the ball races to third man off the outside edge
outside off and safely negotiated
short of a length on leg stump, Tendulkar expects it to move down the leg side but the ball straightens and catches him high on the thigh pad
fires that in outside off at a good pace, 130 kph, left alone
full and wide outside off, Tendulkar drives away from his body past point and Lee runs across and cuts it off

beaten! that was mighty close! comes in with the angle, moves away after pitching. Nobody knows how that ball beat the outside edge and the off stump. Yuvraj wonders what hit him and the Australians go up in appeal and hold back
lands it on 'that' line just outside off and Yuvraj pokes at it, beaten again
hint of inswing, left alone outside off
Lee hits the timber! full and swinging in, Tendulkar leans across for the cover drive, plays away from the body and gets an inside edge onto the stumps. The ball just clips the leg-bail
full outside off, Uthappa gets a stride forward and defends
tucked away to the on side with a flick of the wrists
fires that one in outside off at a lively pace, Uthappa just lets it go
pushed to Symonds at point, Uthappa thinks of a run but is sent back by Yuvraj. Symonds hits the stumps but Uthappa was well in
uppish but safe! half volley outside off, Yuvraj stretches forward and drives uppishly. There were cries of 'catch it' but he bisected the gap between cover and extra cover perfectly
outside edge, races away down to fine leg, Haddin darts across like a cheetah and saves it just inches off the rope
good length on off stump, gets forward and pushes to point
drifts towards the pads, Yuvraj flicks uppishly and the ball goes a couple of bounces down to fine leg
full and swinging away just a touch, Uthappa gets forward and defends
full on off stump, in the slot to drive, Yuvraj turns it to mid-on
slides down the leg side, rare lapse from the Australians after a few deadly overs
attempts an inswinging yorker but he strays towards the pads. Yuvraj clips it late and sets off for a single
played down with soft hands to the off side and both batsmen  set off in a flash. Good running
gets it to shape away from the left hander and Yuvraj fends it to the off side for a single
shuffles across the stumps and defends down to point
attempted yorker, turns into a low full toss, Uthappa gets forward and drives towards cover
safely negotiated by Yuvraj outside off, no demons in this delivery
pitches outside off and moves away with the angle, Yuvraj thinks of cutting it but instead shoulders arms
similar delivery, angles away from him and he leaves it again
fuller in length, gets forward and pushes to point

Bracken finally gets his reward! almost the perfect delivery - comes in to the left hander, Yuvraj sticks his bat out, expects the ball to continue with the line but it shapes away. He gets a thick outside edge and the athletic Gilchrist flings himself to his left and takes the catch
left alone outside the off stump, Dhoni gauges the bounce
overpitched outside off, Uthappa gets in position early to drive and finds the gap between mid-off and cover. He doesnt time it well enough to reach the boundary
short of a good length on off and middle, Uthappa opens the face of the bat and glides it to point
opens the face of the bat and glides it late. This time the ball beats point
full length as he tries to work it across the right-hander, but Uthappa comes well forward in his stride and defends it stoically
pushes this one away from Uthappa, who's beaten as he lunges on the forward press across off stump, that was delivered from close to the stumps and kicked off the surface too
full again and Uthappa comes well forward to negate the movement, copping it on the front pad and the ball rolls into the covers
a straighter delivery from Bracken, pitching in line with off stump and going on, Uthappa gets in line and drives back down the track
good length delivery angled across off stump, to which Uthappa comes forward and defends, getting right over the ball
sweet shot! Uthappa comes forward to another good length delivery and presents  a straight face of the bat, timing it perfectly back down the ground and mid-off and mid-on cant haul it in
back of a length outside off stump, Dhoni twirls it straight to point
fuller delivery comes in from outside off, Dhoni gets forward and square-drives through the cover-point region for one
good length delivery, no room to work with, Uthappa gets forward, a good foot outside his crease, and defends watchfully
beaten! The cutter, this one holds it line and beats Uthappa, expecting it to come in again, just shaving past the outside edge of his bat
similar delivery but this time Uthappa gets behind the line and forward, middling it well as he defends it into the covers

sharp lifter! Hopes, after having to pull out of his delivery at the last second as something distracted Uthappa, steams in and bounces the right-hander with one that kicks off and moves past his nose, forcing him to hop up and get out of the way
comes down the pitch and works a full delivery from off stump to mid-on
back of a length outside off stump, Dhoni quickly gets back and pushes into the covers, where the men are tough to beat
again, he gets back to a short delivery and flashes it into the covers, but Clarke from point is too quick
back of a length again, this time Dhoni plays it much straighter to cover

edged and gone! The thinnest of edges as Dhoni stands rooted to his crease and can't resist fishing at one angled across off stump, a pretty inoccuous delivery but Dhoni's gentle feeler only ended up in Gilchrist's safe gloves .. and thats his 400th catch in one-day cricket as India slip further
back of a length on off stump, he stands and defends to leg
good length delivery comes in from outside off, Uthappa defends and gets an inside-edge towards square leg
good length delivery pushed across the left-hander, who judges it and leaves
effort this time, banging it short outside off stump and Pathan shoulders arms
good length, pitching marginally outside leg stump and moving away, Pathan is struck on the front leg outside the line of impact

and he doesnt trouble the scorers any! Hopes gets it to pitch and angle across Pathan, who is tempted, like Dhoni a moment ago, to push at it and this time its catching practice for second slip ... nothing more than a steer into his hands and Hopes loves it ...
and he gets a short delivery first up, which he leaves alone
good length delivery angled across the stumps, pitches and moves in with extra bounce and surprises Uthappa as he plays forward, the ball rolls to slip
straighter delivery on a length, Uthappa gets in line and defends it getting tall
overpitched on leg stump, a freebie, but Uthappa doesnt catch in, flicking straight to Hodge at midwicket
this one pitches on a great length and moves away with the angle, beating Uthappa as he lunges forward and tries feeling for it, that was very close
a touch fuller this time, allowing Uthappa to get well over it and smother any swing Bracken was hoping to achieve ... swing has been whats undone India under the lights this evening
again he beats Uthappa with one pitching on a great  length and moving away ever so slightly ... Bracken showing that sometimes less swing works more than a prodigous amount
good length outside off, played out to point
good length outside off stump, Harbhajan gets the front leg forward and then shoulders arms quite professionally
back of a length on off stump, Harbhajan whips it to midwicket
similar delivery, similar shot, but this time Harbhajan rolls the wrists further and places it well behind square leg for one
full and rather wide, Uthappa drives hard at it and gets a safe outside-edge down towards third man ... flash hard, as they say
shortish delivery outside off stump, Harbhajan plays it into the covers
clean strike! Uthappa likes the length and swings it, with plenty of wrist power, over wide long-on for half a dozen, powerful and effortless hit
strays onto leg stump and Uthappa flicks it fine for one
back of a length, going away from off stump, Harbhajan shoulders arms
pushed across Harbhajan again, a touch wider off a length, and he is comfortable leaving it be with a raise of the bat
straighter one, coming on with the arm, Harbhajan sizes it up and defends watchfully back down the track to Bracken
good length outside off stump, he pushes it to extra cover and turns down the single
good length delivery outside off stump, Uthappa plants the front foot out and drives hard, mistiming it but safely into the gap behind point for one
back of a length outside off stump, pushed at and theres a safe thick edge along the ground wide of second slip for one more
good length delivery outside off stump, Uthappa was eyeing the onside but splices it, going against the line and turning the bat face, safely over extra cover
short of a length on middle stump, Harbhajan gets inside the line and works it nicely into the ground and into the gap at short fine leg, for one more
the thump is here! Uthappa simply plants the leg out and bludgeons the half-volley back over Lee's head and mid-off had no chance of stopping it
good length delivery outside off stump, he gets forward and defends to cover
back of a length on off stump, played back down the track comfortably
another back of a length delivery which Harbhajan gets upto and pushes into the covers, no chance of a single though
back of a length again, this time Harbhajan tries to leave it alone after pushing forwardd initially, and then the ball clips the bat and drops in front of the keeper
this one pitches and moves, clipping him high above the knee roll and sneaking past Gilchrist for a leg-bye
slower ball, fullish around off stump and Uthappa doesnt pick it too well, but ends up playing it safely back to Hopes

onorthdox but oh so effective! Uthappa walks well down the track and Hopes drops it in short, but the batsman's intent on going through with his shot, connecting well and dismissively creaming it on the up over extra cover for maximum!
short on the stumps, Harbhajan walks across and gets up on the toes, playing it down towards square leg
good length delivery outside off, he greets it with a gentle push to Symonds in the covers
slower delivery outside off stump, he comes onto the front foot and pokes it into the covers where Symonds fields again

chaos! Uthappa pushes a full delivery in the blockhole down the ground, Lee misfields and the ball sneaks past the stumps, Uthappa calls for the risky single, the fielders move in, theres hesitation and they decide chuck it, lets go for the single and thats a very close shave for Harbhajan as the relayed throw to Gilchrist's end is off the mark
good shot, Harbhajan meeting a fuller delivery with a straight bat, driving back down the ground for four
back of a length outside off stump, now Harbhajan decides to leave it be
strays down leg stump and Uthappa cant connect, wide called anyways
good length outside off, Uthappa comes onto the front foot, waits for it, and opens the face to run it down to third man
good length on the stumps, he shuffles and taps it towards midwicket
good length on off stump, Uthappa drops his head and defends it back
full delivery outside off stump, he gets well over it and tries pushing it wide of point  but the fielders too sharp

good length outside off, Uthappa again comes forward but this time misses it, the ball hits the front pad first and Hopes belts out an appeal but Uthappa was saved by his stride forward, and perhaps the height
fuller delivery, played out into the covers
tossed up outside outside off, left alone
shorter one, spins in, he tries to pull but mistimes it to deep square leg
tossed up very well wide of leg stump, a poor ball, Uthappa cashes in with a deft paddle-scoop over Gilchrist for four
tossed up just outside off stump, Uthappa waits for it and opens the face, running it cheekily down to Bracken at third man
fuller delivery, the wrong 'un, which Uthappa picks and uses the feet nicely to drive down towards long-off
tossed up outside leg stump, Harbhajan gets a good stride in and plays it away
quick delivery speared down leg stump, wide, Uthappa again paddles it nicely but just the single this time
arm ball, straight on middle and off, Harbhajan doesnt time it well but survives
goes down the leg stump, marginally, and its not called wide
slips out his fingers, short ball down leg stump, Harbhajan shuffles and scoops it safely over square leg for one
short ball on the stumps, no spin at all, Uthappa pulls out to the deep
speared down leg stump and now its Harbhajan's turn to get cute and paddle it past Gilchrist down to the fielder at fine leg
tossed up on leg stump, spins down and Uthappa plays it to short fine leg
tossed up on off, comes in and Harbhajan defends off the back foot
fuller, pitching on middle and leg and turning sharply down, Harbhajan misses, Gilchrist goes for the stumping, but thats wide
doesnt pick the faster wrong 'un, opting for the pull but ending up dragging it down into the ground in front of cover
full and in the blockhole, Harbhajan digs it back to Hogg

looped up nicely on middle and off, the ball dips and spins in sharply to catch Harbhajan in the jewels ... hes not taken kindly to it and limps off to square leg ... the umpires decide to call for drinks
flat ball spinning down leg stump, Harbhajan tries the paddle again but misses, almost takingout Gilchrist in the process, and the ball runs away to the boundary
fuller delivery on middle and off, he comes forward and defends
full down leg stump, Uthappa tries to flick but takes it off the boot to short fine leg
arm ball on off stump, Uthappa waits and pushes into the covers
quicker ball, flatter trajectory on middle and off, he too makes room and pushes into the gap at point, to much cheer
tossed up down leg stump, no spin again, Uthappa paddles it past short fine leg for one more to keep it ticking along
tossed up outside off, Harbhajan drives nicely into the covers, where Symonds dives and fires in a throw to cut off the single
drifts down leg and Harbhajan tickles it fine for one more
fired in on middle, turns into a yorker and Harbhajan has a wils swing and the ball clips the inside edge and rolls behind the batsman
flighted on leg, Uthappa shuffles and scoops to fine leg
full outside the off stump, Harbhajan gets forward and drives past extra cover, Ponting dives at the boundary
confident forward defensive stroke on the front foot
pitches on off stump and turns sharply. Harbhajan shoulders arms, thinking it would be declared a wide but it wasnt wide enough. Good call
pushed in flat on legstump, gets forward and defends
Uthappa gives himself room, waits for the turn and cuts past point. The placement was perfect as there was no fielder in sight

Clarke strikes! tossed up on off stump, Uthappa gets forward to a full length delivery and tries to defend.The ball hits him low on the pad and umpire Aleem Dar is convinced the ball struck him in line with off stump
drifting on leg and glanced down to fine leg off the pads
solid forward defensive stroke. he can afford to play himself in
bit too much flight, turns into a low full toss. Zaheer pushes it down to long-off
tossed up on off stump, Zaheer waits on it and defends off the front foot
this was just a little short outside off, the wrong 'un, he waits on it and cuts square
paddled across to short fine leg
tossed up and another paddle to short fine-leg
tossed up outside leg and Harbhajan gets down to sweep. Again he can't beat the short fine-leg fielder
flighted on middle and leg, Harbhajan defends and the ball strikes him low on the pad. Hogg appeals but the ball was missing leg easily
nervous start to the over. Bowls the offcutter, the batsman pokes his bat out the the ball gets the outside edge. Fortunately, it falls well short of first slip
the quicker one, angles across the right hander and Zaheer just lets it go
back of a length outside off, Zaheer has another good look at it and lets it go
fuller in length and Zaheer gets a stride forward. He meets the pitch of the ball and glides it wide of point and sets off for a single
drifting on the pads, Harbhajan shuffles and tucks it wide of midwicket. Good running results in a comfortable two
full outside off and in the slot to drive. Harbhajan goes for the cover drive but places it straight to the fielder
wide outside off and Zaheer latches onto it! that was driven uppishly past the covers and placed well
low full toss on leg stump and glanced down to fine leg
another low full toss and this time Harbhajan cannot put it away. ends up pushing it back to Hogg
flighted outside off and fended to point
the wrong 'un. Zaheer waits on it and tries to cut but finds the fielder at point again
low full toss outside off but Zaheer softly plays it towards the covers
slower ball, offcutter on middle and leg, Harbhajan reads it a little late and chooses to defend
aims for thr yorker length ball on off stump but strays a little wide. Harbhajan waits for the wide call but....not wide enough for the umpire Aleem Dar
good length outside off and fended towards point
this time Johnson doesn't get away with it as he strays too wide outside off
short of a length and wide outside off, Harbhajan tries to glide it past the keeper with a lazy glide. Ponting, at wide first slip, takes the catch easily at head-height
yorker length drifting on the pads, tries to flick but the ball clips his pads and rolls to the on side
glided towards third man for a single
loosener outside the off stump, tries to cut but misses
tossed up outside off, defended on the frontfoot
flighted outside off, goes back and slashes it uppishly past the vacant point region
pushed behind point for an easy single
sharp wrong 'un there, Catches Kartik by surprise but he adjusts his stroke on the backfoot and keeps it down
pushed to the off side for a single
drifts towards the pads, Kartik shuffles across his stumps and deftly nudges it wide of midwicket
short of a length on of stump, Zaheer goes back and defends

overpitched outside off and Zaheer senses the opportunity for a boundary. The intentions were correct as he went forward and smashed that past the covers. However, he places it straight to the fielder at the deep
tucked to the on side for a single
slides down the leg side and wide called
Kartik tries to cut but is cramped for room. He nearly chops it onto his stumps
flighted on middle and leg and kartik gets down on his knee and sweeps. The ball gets the top edge and falls in the middle of nowhere
pushed down to long-off for an easy single
slides down the leg side and wide called
gives room and Kartik deftly glides that down towards third man

another premeditated glide and this time Kartik succeeds with a boundary! the fielder darts from shirt third man and ends up crashing into the boundary hoarding. I'm not too sure if the sponsors will be too thrilled to see that
tries to cut but beaten fair and square
starts off with a reverse swinging yorker. Zaheer does well to dig it out
good ball bang on the line of the stumps. Zaheer gets his bat down nicely on it and defends
dishes out another yorker length delivery - this time outside the off stump -  and Zaheer digs it out
that was a neat forward defensive punch down to long-on. Sensible batting by India. They need 31 off 62
confident appeal! teases the batsman with a widish delivery outside off. Kartik was tempted into ths drive. Lee jumped up as the ball beat the bat but umpire Dar wasnt interested
take that! digs out a low full toss outside off and the ball goes screeching past point and thiird man
tossed up outside off stump, he lunges forward and defends to cover
oh thats a good shot! Zaheer takes on Hogg, coming out to meet a tossed up delivery with a clean biff through extra cover for four
tossed up on middle and leg, worked straight to midwicket
tossed up on middle and off, Zaheer gets forward and defends
flatter delivery on middle and off, Zaheer goes back and defends it down
sharp delivery, pitching on middle and leg and spinning into Zaheer, who goes back and keeps it out
back of a length well outside off, Kartik goes chasing and misses
fuller delivery, pitching and beating Kartik's tentative, on-the-up walking drive, the slips and Gilchrist will be licking their lips
better shot from Kartik, using his feet and pushing the ball into the gap at point and collecting out to the deep, drawing cheers from the partisan crowd
good yorker honed in on middle and leg, well played by Zaheer as he tries the flick but digs it back to Lee ... words exchanged, and mainly from Zaheer!
and he's cleared over the ropes! Cool shot, as Zaheer gives it a clean, straight hit back down the ground, clearing long-on by some distance ... immense hit!
again Zaheer looks to go downtown, but he mistimes his heave into the ground, runs hard to collect the single off the inside-edge
back of a length outside off stump, Zaheer wait on it and then runs it down to third man, another cool, calculated shot from the tail-ender
he stands and feels for it, hanging his bat outside off stump, and gets beaten again as the pressure builds on Kartik
full delivery well outside off stump and this time Kartik wisely plants the leg out and shoulders arms

edged away for four! Oh ho ho! Kartik prods forward outside off stump, gets a thick outside edge perfectly between Gilchrist and Ponting at slip, the ball dips and beats Ponting's right hand and races away for crucial runs ... tense!
good length delivery outside off stump, this time Kartik defends to point
beaten! Kartik again pushes forward and is lucky not to get an edge!
slower ball, using the wide angle, Zaheer gets down on bended knee and drives but misses all ends up
back of a length outside off stump, Zaheer's feet dont move much as he tries to cut and gets beaten second ball in a row
top shot! Johnson goes astray this time, pitching down leg stump and Zaheer tickles it deftly off the bat and with fine leg up thats four runs! Johnson is not happy with himself
good length well outside off stump, Zaheer leaves it be
back of a length delivery, no room to work with, Zaheer stands deep in his crease and allows it to come into him, then pushes to point ... a bit of yes-no and they leave it be
much fuller delivery this time on middle and leg, Zaheer pushes it to point again and firmly tells Kartik not to attempt the single
back of a length outside off stump, Kartik stands his ground and leaves it be
beaten again, as Kartik comes forward and feels for a fullish delivery outside off stump, he's cross with himself
once more Kartik cant resist from pushing well forward and missing the ball completely ... he will keep the slips interested playing like this!
fuller delivery outside off stump and this time Kartik presents a compact full face of the bat to defend towards point ... appreciation from Zaheer
good length outside off stump, Kartik leaves well enough alone and Mumbai cheers its appreciation ... Bracken swivels and walks back to his mark
well wide of off stump, width on offer, Kartik reaches out and steers it into the gap at gully and collects a single off the last ball of Bracken's spell
full delivery outside off stump, uneasily driven to extra cover by Kartik
another full delivery on middle and leg, Kartik gets bat on it and works it to midwicket
and again! Kartik cant stop himself from walking into a shot and driving ever so loosely, only to be beaten outside off for the umpteenth time ... talk about frayed nerves here
overpitched on leg stump and thats a nice flick off the pads, into the gap backward of square, out to deep backward square leg for one
but he doesnt use the angle to his advantage, instead bowling it down leg and allowing Zaheer the chance to work it fine for one to fine leg

and thats the win for India, sending the Wankhede Stadium into delirium! Johnson again bowls it full and well down leg stump, Kartik goes for the flick, mistimes it off the boot but gets it past a diving Gilchrist and the ball's away to fine leg for the winning runs!
